title: Everything You Need to Know About the Quake Fruit in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Cost.
steps.content: Cost. Quake is a legendary natural-type Fruit that you can buy from the Blox Fruit Dealer for $1,000,000 beli or 1,500 Robux. You can purchase this Fruit from the Fruit Dealer NPC, who you can find in these areas: Pirate Starter Island Marine Starter Island Docks of Kingdom of Rose (Second Sea) Caf√© (Second Sea) Mansion (Third Sea) Port Town (Third Sea)

steps.title: Usage.
steps.content: Usage. Quake has large hitboxes, so moves are easier to land and harder to avoid. This makes it a better Fruit for PvP, especially after Awakening and all the moves break Instinct (see this wikiHow article for more on rankings of Fruits in Blox Fruits).

steps.title: Quake Punch/Z.
steps.content: Quake Punch/ Z . 1 mastery. Charge an enemy in a ball of energy and deal high damage. This attack shakes the enemy's screen and knocks them back. The hitbox on this move is smaller than the others, so it's harder to hit others.

steps.title: Quake Wave/X.
steps.content: Quake Wave/ X . 50 mastery. Launch an energy ball towards an enemy that deals a lot of damage when it reaches the target. This ball of energy moves slowly and shakes the enemy's screen.

steps.title: Quake Erupt/C.
steps.content: Quake Erupt/ C . 100 mastery. Smash your hands into the ground, dealing a lot of damage in the area.

steps.title: Dual Tsunami/V.
steps.content: Dual Tsunami/ V . 150 mastery. Crack the air and pull any flying enemies to the ground; two tsunamis will approach from both sides and deal a lot of damage to anyone caught between them.

steps.title: Fatal Demolisher /Z.
steps.content: Fatal Demolisher / Z . 1 mastery; 1,000 fragments. Pull an enemy towards you with deceivingly low damage, then launch them away from you while dealing a large amount of damage. The screen will flash red for both players when the enemy is launched away. It costs 17,000 fragments to fully Awaken this Fruit. You can farm for fragments by raiding or defeating Indra and Blackbeard. You'll earn "The Strongest One" title when you Awaken at least 1 move of this fruit.

steps.title: Air Crusher/X.
steps.content: Air Crusher/ X . 50 mastery; 3,000 fragments. Charge a ball of energy, then throw it at an enemy, dealing a medium-to-high amount of damage and shake their screen.

steps.title: Spatial Shockwave/C.
steps.content: Spatial Shockwave/ C . 100 mastery; 5,000 fragments. Hold two balls of energy in your hands. After a few seconds, send out a large shockwave from yourself and deal heavy damage and knockback any enemies in the area. Anyone caught in the shockwave will also have their screen shake.

steps.title: Seaquake/V.
steps.content: Seaquake/ V . 150 mastery; 8,000 fragments. Smash the ground, stunning anyone in the area and dealing a decent amount of damage; this skill also calls 4 tsunamis to crash in your area, stunning and damaging enemies even more. Everyone caught in the tsunamis will see their screens shake. If you are above the sea, this move doesn't do anything. [1] X Research source
